content:
I am new to inferno and fhir, on my local machine I want to authenticate and run inferno fhir api using postman, where can I find all the auth details and urls?
I want to do this so that I can locally test my service that will eventually call our own fhir apis and return data. But, as those apis are not ready yet, I am trying to test my service with inferno test apis and data.
